actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the United States Postal Service or the Postal Rate Commission from requiring handwritten addresses or return addresses on letters of individuals receiving certain special rates.

summary.text: Prohibits the United States Postal Service or the Postal Rate Commission from requiring handwritten addresses or return addresses on letters of individuals which qualify for a special rate, commonly referred to as the "citizens' rate," when establishing such rate.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the United States Postal Service or the Postal Rate Commission from requiring handwritten addresses or return addresses on letters of individuals receiving certain special rates.
